definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
men, women, young and old/all kinds of people/people of all ages
cheating neither old nor young/treating youngsters and old folk equally scrupulously/Our house offers sincere treatment to all and fair trade to old and young alike.
suitable for both the young and the old

sentences.english: All the people,men and women,old and young have plunged into war in the wartime.
sentences.chinese: 战时所有男女老少都投入到战争中去。

sentences.english: ‘The Jungle Book’ is a fantastic book to read and is suitable for all ages.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道《丛林故事》是老少皆宜值得一读的书。

sentences.english: It is a game for young and old .
sentences.chinese: 这是一种老少皆宜的运动。

sentences.english: Both young and old like ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 不论老少都喜欢吃冰淋。

sentences.english: The contemporary riddle culture includes sophisticated puzzles for both children and adults.
sentences.chinese: 现代的谜语文化中也有老少皆宜的精妙谜题。

sentences.english: The toy can serve as "a  communication tool" for the young and old, she said.
sentences.chinese: 她说，该玩具可谓老少咸宜的“沟通工具”。

sentences.english: What sport can learn and easy to understand, ages beneficial to everyone?
sentences.chinese: 什么体育项目能易学易懂，老少皆宜对大家都有益？

sentences.english: Eight spots suitable for all ages, the most family friendly.
sentences.chinese: 八大景点老少咸宜，最适合全家出游。

sentences.english: Taijiquan is an especially helpful exercise to both old and young.
sentences.chinese: 太极拳是一种老少皆宜的运动。

sentences.english: Fruit jelly with milk taste is loved By Both young and old.
sentences.chinese: 奶汁飘香的果子冻，老少都喜欢。

sentences.english: This is a book for young and old.
Men, women and children are put on the family holiday attire, followed by the seated position in the family hierarchy.
sentences.chinese: 全家男女老少都穿上节日的盛装，按辈分依次坐定。

sentences.english: The tree house is definitely a fun fair for both young and old.
sentences.chinese: 树屋肯定是个老少皆宜的乐园。

sentences.english: In addition there are much people on the beach young and old.
sentences.chinese: 另外，海滩上有许多老老少少。

sentences.english: The nourishing Beverages for all ages produced By our factory are most welcome to customers.
sentences.chinese: 本厂生产的滋补饮料，老少皆宜，深受顾客欢迎。

sentences.english: Men and women lined up at the Fair Price Shop in the village of Ban.
sentences.chinese: 在坂村，男女老少在国营平价粮店外排队等候着。

the old and the young/the youngest member of the family
dragged down by having a family to feed
